document_name: Promoting of appliance of Energy Efficiency and Transformation of the refrigerating appliances market in Ghana.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/GHA/00059667/Promoting of appliance of Energy Efficiency and Transformation of the refrigerating appliances market in Ghana.pdf

outputs.output_descr: To improve the energy efficiency of appliances manufactured, marketed and used in Ghana through the introduction of a combination of regulatory tool such as Minimum Energy Performance Standards and Information Labels (S&L) and innovative economic tools.
Ghana has identified accelerated responses towards expanding universal access to modern fuels and creation of opportunities for the productive uses of modern fuels.

project_descr: Promoting of Appliance Energy Efficiency and Transformation of the Refrigerating Appliance Market in Ghana
